name: Water Droplet
description:
Water Droplet is a parkour-platformer that you have to finish the level before time runs out. Help our little droplet to reach the plant before she vanishes.

How to Play:

AD - Move left/right

Space - Jump, Stop Circle

Team:

Yunus Canıtez  - Game Design, Level Design

Akif Akatay - Programmer

Beyza Çalık - Artist

Alexandra Damas - Artist, Animator
